data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: Barnacle Fecundity Monitoring: OSU: 2007

This metadata record documents the barnacle fecundity data for the PISCO intertidal. The reproductive state of two barnacle species is monitored monthly at 6 intertidal PISCO sites. To estimate barnacle reproductive state, eight Balanus glandula and eight Chthamalus fissus/dalli are randomly collected around each of the five barnacle recruitment plates in the middle of the mussel zone.
